entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
